CMSC436 Semester Project 
 
 By Victor Ramos, Michael Cheung, 
 Kris Salvador, Raushan Alleyne 
 
 

About the app: 
 "Take Picture" will bring up a camera, allowing you to take a picture and add a comment. Location will be automatically tagged. Image and comment will be uploaded for anyone to see. 
 
 "View Pictures" will show your location on a Google Map. It will also load all images tagged at the specified location. Clicking on an image will bring up a bigger preview screen and allow you to see the comment/caption associated with the picture.
